attributes.action: Put a cap on rent for tenants where landlords are overcharging
attributes.background:
There is a high demand in rent charges as house prices are going up and landlords are charging extortionate amounts and this amount is rising day by day.
Tenants are now facing problems paying and are desperate to keep up their rent payments alongside their bills in order to survive.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. 

If you like, you could sign the petition below, which asks for the Government to put a cap on private renting prices for working families:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/158058
